title: 04/28/2021 - HOUR 1 - Trey Lance and Mac Jones, Nick Wright
itunes:title: 04/28/2021 - HOUR 1 - Trey Lance and Mac Jones, Nick Wright
description:
Colin discusses what the 49ers should do with the third pick in the NFL draft and how the gap between Trey Lance and Mac Jones is narrowing. Nick Wright joins the show to talk about the NFL draft and Dr. J snubbing LeBron James

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
